list.name: Crashes
list.query: SELECT value FROM "app event" WHERE "state" != 'expired' AND "application" =~ /^$app_name$/ AND "event" =~ /^app.crash$/ AND $timeFilter

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "autogen"."memory used_bytes" WHERE "state" = 'ok' AND "host" =~ /^$app_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "instance", "host" fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "autogen"."memory total_bytes" WHERE "state" = 'ok' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "instance" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "autogen"."disk used_bytes" WHERE "state" = 'ok' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "instance" fill(none)
SELECT count("value") FROM "http response time_ms" WHERE "host" =~ /^$app_name$/ AND "state" = 'ok' AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("value") FROM "http response time_ms" WHERE "host" =~ /^$app_name$/ AND "state" = 'ok' AND "status_code" =~ /^2[0-9]+$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("value") FROM "http response time_ms" WHERE "host" =~ /^$app_name$/ AND "state" = 'ok' AND "status_code" =~ /^5[0-9]+$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("value") FROM "http response time_ms" WHERE "host" =~ /^$app_name$/ AND "state" = 'ok' AND "status_code" =~ /^4[0-9]+$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT mean("value") FROM "http response time_ms" WHERE "state" = 'ok' AND "host" =~ /^$app_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "method" fill(null)
